REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1231 reute r f BC-TRANS-WORLD-LIQUIDATI 04-03 0048

TEXT.TITLE: TRANS WORLD LIQUIDATING TRUST TO CLOSE BOOKS
TEXT.BODY: The Trans World Corp Liquidating Trust said it will permanently close its books of record and transfer on April seven. Beneficial interest in the trust ceased trading on the New York Stock Exchange on March 31, it noted. Reuter
